name: Facebook: No newsfeed, no ads.
description: Sick of Facebook recommending me things to like or rate.
additional_info:
V 1.4.1

Changelog:
1.4.1
- slight adjustment addresses javascript problem

1.4 
- went nuclear: news feed obliterated

1.3
- removed "sponsored" section on other people's profile pages
- changed visibility:hidden back to display:none

1.2
- removed 'trending' section
- hid Left Nav items like "Friends, Interests, Pages, Apps..."; kept "Favourites and Groups"

1.1
- changed display:none to visbility:hidden to reduce clutter on scrolling down.
- removed suggested links (except for suggested groups)
